issue_title: [Bug] Todo.id field accepts negative integers and zero without validation
implementation_summary: Added validation in Todo.__post_init__ to ensure id is a positive integer (id > 0). This validates both direct Todo construction and Todo.from_dict() since both paths go through __post_init__.
risks: Minimal - the validation only rejects invalid data that should never have been accepted. Fixed existing tests that were using id=0 inadvertently.
